import random
import math

for test_Case in range(int(raw_input())):
        potion = raw_input()
        count_potion = [0]*26
        for c in potion:
                count_potion[ord(c)-ord('a')]+=1
        count_ingr = [0]*26
        n = int(raw_input())
        for i in range(n):
                temp = raw_input()
                for c in temp:
                        count_ingr[ord(c)-ord('a')]+=1
        ans = "YES"
        for i in range(26):
                if (count_potion[i]>count_ingr[i]):
                        ans = "NO"
        print ans
